name: places/ChIJsaYZEKZZwokR2aQZFb0Ra7s
formattedAddress: 15 W 28th St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 W 28th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: I went to Deena with zero acting experience and ended up working with her and the teachers at her studio for three years.  People told me it would change my life to work with her, and I thought it was hyperbole but sure enough it changed everything.  I was able to really find my voice, to discover my instrument, my creativity, my heart and to bring all of those things into alignment to live within the scene.  I always felt like someone who was very "stuck in my head" so her physical work was an extremely liberating way for me to discover my bodies intelligence.  Her approach is well rounded and brings together technique with the more visceral physical presence work.  Since starting my acting journey with Deena I have worked with many different teachers and I have not found anyone quite like Deena.  She is fierce, loving and deeply passionate about what she does, and it comes through in all of the amazing work that happens in that classroom and what her students take into their careers.  I strongly recommend working with her.  She's the real deal!

originalText.text: I have been with Deena for a little over 3 years and I love this studio. The focus on technique and work ethic are her main principles. The small classes (12 students max) are key for an actor to really get the hands on adjustments that are needed in order to become a better actor. She will stay late in order to keep working your scene. Every class starts with the most incredible warm up that I could never get enough of and then you dive right into scene work. The 4 part process she teaches filters through into your real life. She is the perfect balance of tough and loving. I truly believe she wants to bring the best out in you. Working with Deena has not only made me a better actor but a better person. Also the other teachers at the studio are right there riding the same wave with you.

originalText.text: To say Deena's workshops and classes are transformative is an understatement. The weekend workshop blew me away and there was no turning back. I immediately knew I needed more. The dedication Deena gives to her students and the unique process work she developed is inspiring. She has this amazing way of identifying what works about you and how those unique traits can be used in every scene you do. Taking Deena's classes gave me the courage to start auditioning and I've been lucky enough to book some work along the way. I knew that Deena could help me become an actor. What I didn't expect was how much it would benefit and change me personally. I've created amazing friendships and connections through the studio and I'll forever be grateful for that.

originalText.text: Be prepared to have your mind blown! I had no idea how much Deena’s workshop would ignite a burning desire to express myself to the fullest, not only in acting but in every part of my life.  Passion, focus and commitment is what Deena brings to every moment she is in the classroom.  She demands integrity and builds a safe environment so you feel free to explore any part of yourself or the character.  Her blend of Meisner repetition and the physical approach of Grotowski had me connecting with the character, and myself, in ways I didn’t know were possible.  Also her “What worked” philosophy helped me to shift into the mindset of building on the good and simply letting go of the rest. After enrolling in Deena’s class my confidence as an actor went up ten fold and I went on to book multiple nations commercials, a couple pilots and several guest star roles.  I know I owe a lot of that success to all the time and energy Deena gave me in class.

originalText.text: When I first embarked on my journey as an actress, I was riddled with fear and self-doubt. Much as I wanted to be successful, I was overcome with apprehension and the belief that my dreams were unattainable. Until I met Deena. She enabled me to turn my inner monologue from one of self-deprecation to one of gratitude, confidence and empowerment. Deena’s emphasis on “what works about you” is a brilliant approach to not only mastering one’s skills as an actor; but to mastering one’s power as a human being. Deena’s techniques are accessible and highly effective and have served me many times both in the audition room and on set. I am so grateful to have worked with Deena. She is a remarkable teacher whose lessons will last a lifetime.
